name: Devils Don't Need No Advocate
description:
Play as a space marine trying to survive in the void with minimum resources and jerkwad robots. 

NOTE - If you have Windows 7, please use the ddnoa_win7.exe. There will be a debug window which you can safely ignore. Sorry for the inconvenience!

Controls

Movement - A to move left, D to move right 

Battle - W to  move cursor up, S to move cursor down, F to choose an action
